reference.title: Retrieving statistics
reference.shortdesc: To retrieve statistics for a node, first retrieve a list of nodes

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p:
To obtain statistics for a node:
Retrieve a list of nodes in a cluster.
Send the statistics request using the IP address and port for a node in the cluster.

section.title: HTTP request
section.p: The curl request for a node list sends the following HTTP request:
section.codeblock: GET /pools/default/buckets/default/nodes HTTP/1.1 User-Agent: curl/7.21.4 (universal-apple-darwin11.0) libcurl/7.21.4 OpenSSL/0.9.8r zlib/1.2.5 Host: 10.5.2.118:8091 Accept: */*
section.p: The curl request for a node's statistics sends the following HTTP request:
section.codeblock: GET /pools/default/buckets/default/nodes/10.4.2.4%3A8091/stats HTTP/1.1 User-Agent: curl/7.21.4 (universal-apple-darwin11.0) libcurl/7.21.4 OpenSSL/0.9.8r zlib/1.2.5 Host: 10.4.2.4:8091 Accept: */*
